author: arkurth
msg: Fixed bug in Windows.pm::set_file_owner() subroutine. It wasn't checking the results from run_ssh_command() correctly.

Fixed bug in Windows.pm::logoff_users(). It passes the numeric session ID to logoff.exe if it's > 0. The logoff.exe utility has problems if the ID is 0. If the session ID is 0, it passes the session name.

author: julianfoad
msg: On failure to connect to the repository, give a consistent and readable
error message. This particularly helps in cases where the error message
from the specific RA layer is poor, such as RA-Neon's "200 OK" error message.
(svn_ra_open3): Wrap any error returned from the open_session() method.

author: mnuttall
msg: ARIES-89: Implement application support: make createApplication() throw an exception if one or more bundle conversions were attempted but failed.
